attributes.action: Stop Men being Fleeced on Divorce
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Even if it's the womans fault, men get taken to the cleaners. Women should leave a marriage with the assets they bought into it. Too often men are left with no home, no money and little contact with Children. The balance should be redressed.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
